content: performance depends on many factors, including latency through the adapters, cable lengths, and the type of workload. b. Where applicable, the minimum fiber bandwidth distance in MHz-km for multi-mode fiber optic links is included in parentheses. c. For 32 Gbps links, point to point (to another switch, director, DWDM equipment or another FICON Express3sS) distance is limited to 5 km (3.1 miles). d. A 600 meters (1958.5 feet) maximum when sharing the switch across two RoCE Express features.
